document_data.name: ''Wand of Evil Protection''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Wands of evil protection''''' were [[enchanted]] [[wand]]s that held multiple charges of protective [[spell]]s unleashed upon command.
document_data.Description: ''Wands of evil protection'' were {{SI|1'3|'"|long=yes}} shafts with a round flat head. The total number of charges varied from wand to wand.
document_data.Powers: Each of these items held several charges of the ''[[protection from evil]]'' spell. The [[magic]]s held within the wand could be discharged at will using a [[command word]]. Upon expenditure of a wand's last charge, was destroyed and consumed by magic.
document_data.Notable Owners: *[[Nym (Icewind Dale)|Nym]], a [[drow]] proprietor of rare and magical goods who traveled [[Icewind Dale]] and [[Dorn's Deep]] in the late 13{{th}} and early 14{{th}} centuries [[DR]].
